text:
[Verse]
Little toy soldiers stand tall
In a line down the hall
Tiny hats lean to fall
Marching round through it all

[Verse 2]
Plastic faces they don't change
In a world that's so strange
Tiny battles they arrange
Fighting dreams out of range

[Chorus]
Toy soldiers in the night
Shining in the moonlight
Plastic hearts still fight
Always ready for the fight

[Verse 3]
In the box they retreat
To a beat so sweet
Tiny feet quick and neat
As the drum’s steady beat

[Chorus]
Toy soldiers in the night
Shining in the moonlight
Plastic hearts still fight
Always ready for the fight

[Bridge]
Tiny warriors brave and bold
In their tales softly told
In their hands shields of gold
Guarding dreams never old
title: Toy Soldiers
